UsageDescription: 用于将提供的文本压缩，同时保持原意不变。只输出结果，不要包含其他内容。
ChinesePromptTemplate:
重写由三个引号括起来的文本，并将其缩减至原文字数的{{...}}倍。保持意思相同。只给我输出结果，别的什么也不要。不要将回应放在引号中。现在，根据上述概念，重写下列文本。用以下文本的同一语言变体或方言回应：
"""
{{...}}
"""
EnglishPromptTemplate:
Rewrite the text enclosed in three quotation marks and reduce it to {{...}} times its original word count. Keep the meaning the same. Only give me the output and nothing else. Do not wrap responses in quotes. Now, using the concepts above, re-write the following text. Respond in the same language variety or dialect of the following text: 
"""
{{...}}
"""

Inputs.InputPlaceholder: 请输入您希望缩减的文本内容。
